Beer With Geeks 145: Live Your Life By Shipoopi

10 Feb 2017
Beer With Geeks Podcasts

This week on Beer With Geeks, Frank and Tim talk (and sing) about their favorite musicals of all time. Whether the Broadway or Hollywood varitey, there are just too many to choose from, so consider this part 1. Cheers!
